summary: Sports shop e-commerce site for selling table tennis balls, badminton shuttles, and stickers (coming soon), with multi-admin support for collaborative management
architectural_notes: E-commerce focused on two initial products: table tennis balls and badminton shuttles
Target audience: friends of the shop owner
Payment methods: cash and GPay (GPay not yet implemented)
Multi-admin support required for collaborative management
Product categories: table tennis balls, badminton shuttles, stickers (coming soon)
Instagram contact feature for customer inquiries via DM
known_issues: Vixen T.T Ball product image still incorrect - should show 6 balls in cardboard/paper packaging (not the current image)
Vixen T.T Ball product displaying incorrect price (300 rupees instead of 20 rupees)
Price update to ₹20 not reflected on frontend

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog page displaying table tennis balls and badminton shuttles with product images, names, descriptions, and prices
Implement shopping cart functionality allowing users to add products, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items
Create a checkout flow where users can review their order and complete a purchase
Render generated product images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for table tennis balls and badminton shuttles
Apply a vibrant, energetic visual theme with sporty colors (bright greens, oranges, or reds), bold typography, and dynamic layouts that convey athleticism and energy throughout the entire application
Update the application name from current branding to 'yourdailysprtshop' across all frontend components including the header logo text, page titles, and footer branding
Add payment method selection to the checkout page with two options: 'Cash' and 'GPay', where GPay is displayed as unavailable/disabled with appropriate visual indication

Create an admin panel interface with authentication that allows authorized users to add, edit, and remove products from the catalog, including fields for product name, description, price, category, and stock quantity
Add a separate 'Stickers' tab in the navigation that displays a 'Coming Soon' message or placeholder indicating this product category will be available in the future
Add Instagram handle display to the footer or contact section so customers can find and DM the shop owner on Instagram
Update the Instagram handle displayed in the footer from '@yourdailysportshop' to '@itznabeastbro' and ensure the link points to https://www.instagram.com/itznabeastbro/
Replace the Vixen T.T Ball product image with the user-provided image showing the orange Vixen table tennis ball with yellow packaging, ensuring it renders in the product catalog and cart
Generate a new product image for Vixen T.T Ball showing exactly 6 orange table tennis balls in cardboard or paper packaging to replace the current incorrect image

Replace the Vixen T.T Ball product image with the user-provided image showing the orange Vixen table tennis ball in yellow packaging, ensuring it renders correctly in the product catalog and shopping cart

Debug and fix the add-to-cart functionality so that when users click the 'Add to Cart' button on any product card, the product is successfully added to their shopping cart and the cart item count badge updates in the header navigation
Debug and fix the cash-on-delivery payment method selection and order completion flow so that users can successfully select 'Cash' as payment method and complete their checkout

new_feature_requests.summary: Display products (table tennis balls and badminton shuttles)
Create a backend data model to store product information including name, description, price, category (table tennis balls or badminton shuttles), and stock quantity
Implement backend functions to list all available products and retrieve individual product details
Support multiple payment methods: cash and GPay (GPay currently unavailable)
Update backend checkout function to accept and store the selected payment method (cash or gpay) with the order
Build an admin panel for adding, editing, and removing products
Support multiple admin users (for owner and friend)
Add a separate 'Stickers' product category tab (marked as coming soon)

Implement multi-admin support in the backend to allow multiple authorized users (owner and friend) to manage the shop, storing admin identities and verifying permissions for product management operations
Display Instagram handle so customers can DM the shop owner

Add a new product to the catalog with the following details: Name: 'Vixen T.T Ball Top Orange (40mm) Table Tennis Ball', Category: 'Table Tennis Balls', Price: 15 rupees per ball, with appropriate stock quantity
Update the Vixen T.T Ball Top Orange (40mm) Table Tennis Ball product price from dollars to ₹20 (20 rupees) in the backend product data

Update the Vixen T.T Ball product price in the backend from its current value to exactly 20 (representing ₹20 per ball), ensuring the price is stored as a Nat type and displays correctly throughout the application

Replace the current Vixen T.T Ball product image with the user-provided image showing the orange Vixen table tennis ball with yellow packaging across all frontend components including ProductCard and CartItem
Update the Vixen T.T Ball product price from ₹300 to ₹20 in the backend product data
Update the Vixen T.T Ball product price in the backend from 300 to 20 (representing ₹20 per ball), ensuring the price is stored as a Nat type and the change persists across deployments
Fix the Vixen T.T Ball product price display to show ₹20 instead of the current incorrect price throughout the application including the product catalog, cart, and checkout pages
